value.stringValue: Invited to quote for specific work

fields.name: contactRoleHeader
fields.fieldText: Please assign the primary contact to this opportunity:

fields.name: OpportunityDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please enter details below to create an opportunity.

fields.name: Close_Date
fields.helpText: When will this opportunity be closed as won?

fields.name: Revenue_Start_Date
fields.helpText: When will we begin to see revenue from this opportunity if won?

fields.name: Opportunity_Term_Months
fields.helpText: How many months will the estimated value of this opportunity be spread across?

fields.name: Opportunity_Reminder_Date
fields.helpText: Set a reminder to chase up this opportunity on a certain date.

fields.name: Opportunity_Estimated_Value
fields.helpText: What is the total estimated revenue of this opportunity.

fields.name: Opportunity_Estimated_GM
fields.helpText: What is the gross margin percentage we will make on this opportunity?

fields.name: Warning_Duping_Contact
fields.fieldText:
You're about to create a duplicate contact which will cause the flow to fail.


Please go back to the lead > details and link the existing contact record here before proceeding.

fields.name: NewAccountDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
This lead is not linked to an existing account, click next to create an account.


Please make sure you have checked for an existing account before attempting to create a new one.
